ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] hi I need help
ygData.msgSnippet: A Bard was one of my first classes I played and they are great for exploring places due to their speed song.  At high levels they can pretty much fill the role
ygData.messageBody:
A Bard was one of my first classes I played and they are great for exploring
places due to their speed song. At high levels they can pretty much fill
the role of just about any class. I suggest putting all your songs in the
number row since you'll be 'twisting' quite a few songs..upto 4 if your good
enough. Happy Hunting!

Dabruiser Troll
Warrior of the 29th Season

-----Original Message-----
From: Erik Johnson [mailto:naslund19@...]
